about_the_game:
Let the dark side rule with the Cursed Kingdom Monster pack by Michael Galefire! This pack contains 17 amazingly detailed Hellish Monster battlers for your heroes to battle against.

Created in Michael's signature painted style, this pack features new enemies that will bring your epic battles to life. Inspired by a variety of modern video games and comic books, this pack features a sleek design and concepts to inspire your game development!

Features:

* 17 Hellish Monster Battlers:
* Abyssal Grub, Chomper, Devourer Spawn, Disciple, Enthralled, Ettin, Eye Ghost, Voracious Demon, Flayer, Ghelthukkos, Hellhunger, Prophet, Reaver, Unchained, Veiled, Wraith Footman and Wraith Knight
* Created in Michael's signature painted style, amazingly detailed graphics!
* Easy to use and formatted for RPG Maker MV
* For use in RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please Read Before You Buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Cursed Kingdoms Monster Pack" and "RPG Maker MV - Cursed Kingdoms Monster Pack" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!

short_description: Need some sinister beings for your heroes to slay? The Cursed Kingdoms Monster Pack has seventeen dark fantasy beasts for your heroes to battle!
